title: Sanding and finishing hardwood floors
brief_description: This do-it-yourself video guides the beginner on how to sand and finish hardwood floors. It will instruct you on preparing an old or new floor, loading and operating sanders and buffers, and correcting mistakes that may occur. It will also advise you on selecting a finish, filling cracks, appropriate application equipment and health and safety measures.
